About El Ranchero Mexican Restaurant El Ranchero Mexican Restaurant is a Fast Food restaurant located at 562 Cobb Pky Se in Marietta, GA . El Ranchero Mexican Restaurant has been described as an Perfect Fast Food restaurant and has received an average rating of 10 by our members. Quick Facts
Cuisine: Fast Food, Mexican, Latin American Accepts Credit Card: Yes Parking: N/A
Atmosphere: N/A Take Reservations: Yes Serves Alcohol: N/A Smoking Allowed: No
User Reviews for El Ranchero Mexican Restaurant
All Reviews for El Ranchero Mexican Restaurant
Anonymous
March 27, 2009
Food
10
Decor
10
Service
10
This place was great! It was just like on the food network. Luckily i was able to go to NYC that summer after seeing the show. The hotdogs were cheap and had a wonderful taste and crispy skin. I got the papaya drink and it was amazing! the combo of the two were fantastic! My only regret was not getting 2+hotdogs and a super size drink!! They quickly took my order and i was back on the street. Highly recommended!
Overall Rating
10
"Perfect"
